item.title: 优步支持的 Moove 将为 Waymo 车队举债 12 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，非洲打车初创公司Moove即将在一轮债务融资中筹集12亿美元，这将帮助该公司与Alphabet公司旗下的Waymo合作，为自动驾驶车队的推广提供资金，并在美国市场扩张。【原文：African ride-hailing startup Moove is close to raising $1.2 billion in a debt round that will help it finance a rollout of an autonomous-driving fleet with Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo and expand in the US, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 审计员警告：法国亟需控制财政状况
item.description: 法国审计法院表示，法国必须紧急采取措施控制公共财政，否则很快就会被迫采取痛苦的紧缩政策，这凸显了因财政计划而面临崩溃风险的少数派政府所面临的困难。【原文：France must urgently take steps to rein in public finances or soon be forced into painful austerity, the country’s audit court said, highlighting the difficulties for a minority government already at risk of collapse over fiscal plans.】

item.title: KKR 强势竞购思百吉，力图结束英国的艰难时期
item.description: KKR & Co.正试图通过发起本年度最大的收购竞标，结束英国公开市场上一反常态的零散交易。【原文：KKR & Co. is seeking to end an uncharacteristically patchy run of dealmaking in the UK’s public markets by launching its biggest takeover bid of the year.】

item.title: 百利交易后，Intralot 有买家要求增加股本
item.description: Intralot 新任首席执行官表示，Intralot 已收到投资者对其即将进行的 4 亿欧元（约合 4.706 亿美元）股票出售的承诺，此举是在该公司同意收购 Bally 的互动国际业务之后做出的。【原文：Intralot has received commitments from investors for its upcoming €400 million ($470.6 million) share sale, a move that comes after it agreed to buy Bally’s Interactive International business, the company’s incoming chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 联合国称刚果向卢旺达的矿产走私达到 "前所未有的水平
item.description: 一份联合国专家报告称，在卢旺达支持的 "3-23 "运动叛军占领刚果民主共和国东部大片地区之际，从该地区向邻国卢旺达走私矿产的活动达到了 "前所未有的程度"。【原文：Mineral smuggling from eastern Democratic Republic of Congo into neighboring Rwanda has reached “unprecedented levels” amid the occupation of a large swath of the region by Rwanda-backed M23 rebels, according to a United Nations experts report.】

item.title: 摩根大通冒险冲刺 5 天帮助华纳兄弟一分为二
item.description: 摩根大通银行的银行家们知道，他们正在策划的交易将面临激烈的反对。【原文：The bankers from JPMorgan Chase & Co. knew the deal they were cooking up would face fierce opposition.】

item.title: 联合国小组称伦巴第奥迪尔洗钱案中的乌兹别克人被不公正拘留
item.description: 一个联合国小组得出结论说，在即将进行的涉及 Lombard Odier & Cie 公司的瑞士洗钱审判中，乌兹别克女商人处于核心位置，她被本国政府不公平地拘留了多年。【原文：The Uzbek businesswoman at the heart of an impending Swiss money-laundering trial involving Lombard Odier & Cie was unfairly detained by her government for years, a United Nations panel concluded.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革将在短短六个月内使 1,100 万人转入新系统
item.description: 从 2026 年 1 月起，荷兰将有近 1100 万人转而采用新的退休计划，因为荷兰正在进行养老金改革，人们普遍预计这将刺激整个欧洲债券市场的波动。【原文：Nearly 11 million people in the Netherlands will switch to a new retirement plan from January 2026, as the country embarks on a pension overhaul that’s widely expected to spur volatility across European bond markets.】

item.title: 获得17亿美元飞机订单，庞巴迪股价创2018年以来新高
item.description: 总部位于魁北克的私人飞机制造商庞巴迪公司（Bombardier Inc.【原文：Bombardier Inc. shares soared to the highest level in seven years after the Quebec-based private jet-maker announced a $1.7 billion aircraft order with an anonymous client.】

item.title: 贝莱德比特币 ETF 带来的收入超过其 S&P 500 基金
item.description: 在全球最大的资产管理公司中，比特币交易所交易基金现在的收入超过了其标志性的 S&P 500 指数跟踪基金。【原文：At the world’s biggest asset manager, a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund now generates more revenue than its signature tracker of the S&P 500 Index.】

item.title: 美国调查被控与黑客合谋的前赎金谈判代表
item.description: 据一家名为 DigitalMint 的公司发表的声明称，执法人员正在调查该公司的一名前雇员，该公司负责在勒索软件攻击期间与黑客谈判并促成加密货币支付。【原文：Law enforcement officials are investigating a former employee of a company that negotiates with hackers and facilitates cryptocurrency payments during ransomware attacks, according to a statement from the firm, DigitalMint.】

item.title: 据说 ADIA 和 CVC 是有意入股价值 120 亿美元的 Aggreko 的公司之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比投资局、收购公司 KKR & Co.和 CVC Capital Partners Plc 都在考虑收购全球最大的便携式发电机供应商之一 Aggreko 的少数股权。【原文：The Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, buyout firms KKR & Co. and CVC Capital Partners Plc are among parties considering buying a minority stake in Aggreko, one of the world’s biggest suppliers of portable power generators, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南方公园》首播季推迟，流媒体版权悬而未决
item.description: 喜剧中心（Comedy Central）推迟了《南方公园》（South Park）新一季的首播时间，引起了该剧主创人员的强烈反应。【原文：Comedy Central has delayed the upcoming debut of the new season of South Park, prompting a vitriolic response from the show’s creators.】

item.title: 波兰意外降息，通胀将有所缓解
item.description: 波兰央行在暂停一个月后意外降息，并表示未来几个月通胀率可能会在其目标范围内放缓，这提高了人们对货币宽松政策将继续下去的预期。【原文：Poland’s central bank unexpectedly cut interest rates after a one-month pause and said inflation is likely to ease within its target in the coming months, raising expectations that monetary easing is set to continue.】

item.title: 私人就业数据引发增长担忧，美股收平
item.description: 美国股市收平，抹去了盘前跌幅，此前一份报告显示就业人数意外下降，引发了市场对经济增长放缓的担忧，而周四将公布的劳动力指数更受市场关注。【原文：US stocks were flat, erasing pre-market losses after a report showing an unexpected decline in employment raised concerns of slowing economic growth ahead of a more widely followed gauge of labor due Thursday.】

item.title: 斯卡拉穆奇称加密货币财政公司趋势 "将逐渐消失
item.description: 对冲基金天桥资本（SkyBridge Capital）的创始人兼管理合伙人安东尼-斯卡拉穆奇（Anthony Scaramucci）说，最近采用加密货币财务策略的上市公司越来越多，这是一种趋势，最终会消失。【原文：Anthony Scaramucci, founder and managing partner of the hedge fund SkyBridge Capital, says that the recent proliferation of public companies adopting crypto treasury strategies is a trend that will eventually go away.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的阿特金斯表示，该机构将研究有关空白支票公司的规则
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）表示，该机构将审查加强对美国空头支票公司监督的规则。【原文：Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Paul Atkins says the agency will examine rules that had increased oversight of US blank-check companies.】

item.title: 英国就俄罗斯影子舰队逃避制裁发出红色警报
item.description: 英国政府发布红色警报，对与俄罗斯石油和天然气销售相关的潜在逃避制裁行为表示担忧。【原文：The UK government issued a red alert to raise concerns about potential sanctions evasion tied to the sale of Russian oil and gas.】

item.title: FCA 称欺凌和骚扰属于工作场所不当行为
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）已经澄清，工作场所中的严重欺凌、骚扰和暴力行为属于金融公司的不当行为，这种行为最终可能导致被禁止进入该行业。【原文：The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority has clarified that serious bullying, harassment and violence in the work place qualify as misconduct at financial firms, behavior that could ultimately lead to a ban from the sector.】

item.title: 微软将在第二轮大规模裁员中裁减 9000 名员工
item.description: 微软公司开始裁员，将影响约 9000 名员工，这是该公司今年为控制成本而进行的第二次大规模裁员。【原文：Microsoft Corp. began job cuts that will impact about 9,000 workers, a second major wave of layoffs this year as it seeks to control costs.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为尼日利亚财政赤字因石油收入减少而扩大
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，尼日利亚的经济改革改善了投资者的情绪，但油价下跌将扩大该国今年的预算缺口，从而损害了该国的财政状况。【原文：Nigerian economic reforms have improved investor sentiment but the nation’s finances are being hurt by lower oil prices that will widen its budget gap this year, said the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 欧佩克石油产量攀升，沙特引领对市场份额的追求
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧佩克（OPEC）的原油产量达到四个月来的最高水平，因为沙特阿拉伯带头大幅增加中东地区的出口，以夺回市场份额。【原文：OPEC bolstered crude production by the most in four months as Saudi Arabia led a surge of Middle East exports in a bid to reclaim market share, a Bloomberg survey shows.】

item.title: 法院延迟审理刺激土耳其债券反弹，收复 2025 年失地
item.description: 在法院决定推迟对该国反对派领导人的裁决后，土耳其以里拉计价的债券抹去了今年以来的跌幅，在短短两天内反弹超过 3%。【原文：Turkey’s lira-denominated bonds erased their year-to-date losses after a court’s decision to postpone its ruling on the country’s opposition leader spurred a rally of over 3% in just two days.】

item.title: 德意志银行称欧元信贷将受益于美元汇率变化
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的策略师表示，随着 "去美元化 "主题日益受到重视，投资者将把越来越多的现金从美国投资级债券转移到欧洲。【原文：Investors will shift increasing amounts of cash coming from US investment-grade bonds to Europe as the “de-dollarization” theme is gaining traction, according to Deutsche Bank AG strategists.】

item.title: 英国财政大臣职位存疑，英债和英镑下跌
item.description: 由于对英国财政政策的担忧，英国债券和英镑遭到抛售。【原文：UK bonds and the pound sold off on concern around the nation’s fiscal policies.】
